alert.note: Alert for Gillespie (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 20 at 6:00PM CDT until April 20 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN BLANCO...NORTHEASTERN GILLESPIE AND SOUTHERN LLANO COUNTIES... At 600 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Crabapple to near Eckert to near Willow City, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. Quarter size hail was reported near Willow City at 551 PM CST. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kingsland, Llano, Round Mountain, Gainesville, Horseshoe Bay, Cherry Spring, Blowout, Enchanted Rock State Natural Area, Willow City, Prairie Mountain, Stolz, Eckert, Crabapple, Oxford and Sunrise Beach Village. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
